# Phase 4: Acceptance Criteria (Success Metrics)

<div class="grid grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-8">

<div>

## What Is It?

**Measurable verification steps** generated using the **M.A.P** framework

### Purpose
- Define "done"
- Enable testing
- Validate features
- Document success

### Generated By
AI using SPEC + Guardrails as input

</div>

<div>

## Example: FIFA Navigator AC

### Map Component
- [ ] Map renders centered on Mercedes-Benz Stadium
- [ ] Traffic layer displays current conditions
- [ ] Map is interactive (pan, zoom work)
- [ ] Mobile: Map takes full viewport

### Transit Data
- [ ] Blue markers show bus locations
- [ ] Red markers show train locations
- [ ] Markers update every 30 seconds
- [ ] Codespaces: Console logs "Using proxy"
- [ ] Production: Console logs "Direct connection"

### Internationalization
- [ ] Language switcher visible in top-right
- [ ] All 4 languages selectable (EN/ES/DE/KO)
- [ ] All UI text translates correctly
- [ ] No hardcoded English strings remain

</div>

</div>

<div class="mt-4 p-4 bg-purple-500/10 rounded-lg">
✅ **AC = The "Proof"** — verifiable checkboxes for completion
</div>
